import React, { useState } from 'react' export default function ThrillerTable({thrillerState, removeMovie}) { const activateRemoveMovie = (movieId) => { removeMovie(movieId) } return ( {thrillerState.map((p,i) => )}
ID Name Year Personal rating Actions
{i+1} {p.name} {p.year} {p.rating}
) }
